review_details: Captain Dimitris and his boat Alexandros traveled us to the most stunning and fantastic beaches and water of Skiathos island and to some other small islands! We explored and we dive and my friends and I we loved this experience!! Thank you so much!!!
The best juice I ever had, hard to find... With fresh summer fruits and a little dark chocolate! Really love it the barman was really good and put passion and "Greek meraki" in his work!! Thank you!
